A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They destroyed Lukes character. Lukes ghost fights kylo. Bad fighting choreography. A lot of nothing happened. The most powerful character(snoke) was killed by a stupid trick. Still dont know who Snoke is and hes dead by the way. The new characters suck. Purple hair lady was lame and boring. Most of the movie was a slow car chase in space. Fynns character is worthless(and it sucks cuz u like Fynn). Rey still isnt trained but now some how shes ready. Leiah dies but not really LOL. Then she shoots Poe with some blaster gun for no reason. This movie had so much potential to be great but ended up being a giant cliff hanger. So stupid. Dont waste your time. Im done wasting mine: Im done with Star Wars. What a joke.
